SEARCH
Package it.polimi.GC13.network.socket

Class SocketServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.GC13.network.socket.SocketServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface, Runnable
public class SocketServer extends Object implements ServerInterface, Runnable
Class that represents the "virtual server" for the client

clients calls the methods of this class the class then creates the messages and sends them to the server where they'll be elaborated

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ClientDispatcher
    getClientDispatcher()
    Method used to retrieve the client dispatcher to send the message from the server after reconnection.
    void
    run()
    Thread used to read messages sent by the server and forward them to the ClientInterface It also reveals when the server isn't connected anymore
    void
    sendMessageFromClient(MessagesFromClient messages)
    Method used to send messages from client to the server.

    Method used to signal connection between client and server.

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketServer

      public SocketServer(Socket socket, ClientDispatcher clientDispatcher, ConnectionBuilder connectionBuilder) throws IOException
      Constructs a SocketServer object with the specified socket, client dispatcher, and connection builder.
      Parameters:
      socket - The socket representing the network connection to the server.
      clientDispatcher - The client dispatcher for routing server messages to the client.
      connectionBuilder - The connection builder for handling connection events.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while initializing the input and output streams.
